subject: Initial consultation call
notes: Discussed current pain points and software requirements. Very interested in our enterprise solution. Next step: send detailed proposal.

subject: Demo scheduling
notes: Sent calendar invite for product demo next week. Client requested focus on API integration capabilities.

subject: Discovery meeting
notes: Met with their IT team to understand current infrastructure. Identified integration challenges and potential solutions.

subject: Pricing negotiation
notes: Discussed volume discounts and payment terms. Client interested in annual contract with quarterly payments.

subject: Implementation kickoff
notes: Sent project timeline and assigned technical account manager. Implementation scheduled to begin next month.
